description: This Java source file defines the MockBridgeCluster class, which extends a mock cluster class to simulate a bridge device in testing. It includes methods for handling manufacturer commands, managing listeners, and handling tamper status, as well as constants for command and alarm identifiers.

classes.name: MockBridgeCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a bridge cluster used in testing, capable of handling manufacturer commands such as refresh, reset, and zone configuration, and managing tamper status.

classes.name: MockBridgeCluster.BridgeListener
classes.description: Interface for listeners that respond to a refresh request from the mock bridge.

methods.name: MockBridgeCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock bridge with a specific EUI64 and endpoint ID, and setting up manufacturer attributes.

methods.name: handleMfgCommand
methods.description: Handles manufacturer specific commands like refresh, reset, and zone configuration based on command ID.

methods.name: addBridgeListener
methods.description: Adds a listener that implements the BridgeListener interface to receive refresh notifications.

methods.name: removeBridgeListener
methods.description: Removes a previously added bridge listener.

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Returns whether the bridge has been tampered with.

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Sets the tampered status of the bridge and sends an alarm event if the status changes.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Overrides attribute data setting, currently always returns success.
